name: Oracle
queryCode: SELECT t1.BSCOPE, t1.OPPRIV, t1.SYSTEMFLAG, t1.SYS_PERMISSIONID, t11.SYS_PERMISSIONNAME, t1.SYS_PERMISSION_ACTIONID, t1.SYS_PERMISSION_ACTIONNAME FROM IBZPERMISSIONACTION t1 LEFT JOIN IBZPERMISSION t11 ON t1.SYS_PERMISSIONID = t11.SYS_PERMISSIONID LEFT JOIN IBZPERMISSION t ON T1.SYS_PERMISSIONID = T.SYS_PERMISSIONID LEFT JOIN IBZROLE_PERMISSION T2 ON T.SYS_PERMISSIONID = T2.SYS_PERMISSIONID LEFT JOIN IBZUSER_ROLE T3 ON T3.SYS_ROLEID = T2.SYS_ROLEID LEFT JOIN IBZPERMISSION T4 ON T4.SYS_PERMISSIONID = T2.SYS_PERMISSIONID LEFT JOIN IBZROLE T5 ON T5.SYS_ROLEID = T3.SYS_ROLEID
